title: „ÄêBug Fixes„ÄëLow Frame Rate Fixed
contents: „ÄêVersion 1.1.105 Update Notes„Äë 1. Fixed an issue where font sizes were abnormal on certain interfaces in PC mode. 2. Fixed an issue with low frame rates when opening certain interfaces. In addition to the lag issue that has already been fixed, there is another type of lag that may occur due to certain mods becoming incompatible after updates. This can result in errors being written into the registry, causing slow game startup and lag during gameplay. We have already made some updates to improve mod compatibility. You can try the following solution to address this issue (please back up the registry folder before proceeding. This process is generally safe and does not affect the game itself, but if a mod has a bug or a modded save file appears corrupted, you may need to restore the registry): Open "Registry Editor" on Windows and paste the following path into the address bar to locate the guigubahuang registry folder: Computer\HKEY_CURRENT_USER\SOFTWARE\guigugame\guigubahuang Right-click and select "Export" to create a backup of the registry file. Once the backup is secured, right-click and delete this registry folder. Then check if the lag issue is resolved. If the lag persists at the same level after the update, you can choose to send us both your registry file and game save data for further investigation. You can export your save data via the "Export" button in the game's main menu and email it to us at: info@lightning.games. We will analyze your save data and registry to identify factors contributing to the lag and aim to address them in future updates. We are also actively investigating which specific mod is causing these errors. However, resolving the issue entirely may require updates from the mod authors themselves.

title: Tale of Immortal official 1.0 Version update! New content + Optimization!
contents: Note. English localization is still under progress, we will try finish all the translation ASAP Updated at 19:00 on May 26, 2023 before players enter the game, we have a reminder regarding game saves: Due to multiple updates, if you created a save file during the early access stages of the game, used tools such as "modifiers" or "mods" to alter save file contents, or forcefully closed the game multiple times through methods like force-quitting or quick saving, you may encounter compatibility issues with the official version once it is released. If you encounter such a situation, we recommend the following solutions: If you have previously manually exported and saved a backup of your saved file, you can try replacing it. 2. Check Steam Discussions or workshops for relevant tools or discuss with players to see if anyone has encountered a similar situation and found a solution. 3. Start a new game. 4. Send your old save file to info@lightning.games, and we will attempt to repair it for you. 1. Added the feature of skippable prologue storyline above the difficulty mode. 2. Optimized the processing logic of the monthly summary and improved the performance. 3. Added new props Enigmatic Stone (can be used to inherit affixes when learning skills), can trigger special missions in Manual Pavilion. 4. Added NPC interactive plots. 5. Added 2 sets of character drawings. 6. Added the option for players to freely choose the quality of mapping and special effects (lowering the quality can improve the smoothness). 7. Optimized the performance of some interfaces. 8. Optimized the problem of repetition of BOSS in the early stages of the game. 9. Increased the drop of soul stones from dungeons. 10. Increased the skill cultivation that can be obtained during the battle. 11. Added some new battle scenes (regular dungeon of Hua Feng). 12. Added special bonus dungeons on the big map (probability to be brushed out when refreshing regular dungeons). 13. Reduced the requirement of rollback points when rollbacking affixes when comprehending skill. 14. Added the effect of the talent wheel of some artifacts and improved the drop probability of artifacts. 16. Added some of the effects of immortal spells that are not in effect. 17. Optimized the character actions in the battle.

title: Official version coming soon! Free dlc with be available in limited time!
contents: Dear cultivators, after two years of Early Access stage development, the official version of Tale of Immortal will be released on May 26th between 11am and 1pm UTC. Over the past few months, we have further optimised the game and added some new content, and we sincerely hope that this update will please our players. We will be updating the game from time to time with more interesting and fun things in the future, so please stay tuned. Furthermore, you will also be able to receive a DLC for free when this version launches (this event will last for seven days) The localization of the Official Version is still not completed. 95% of the all content is already translated, but only about 60% of the new content of this version (including DLC) is translated. We will try our best to finish the work ASAP. We sincerely wish for your understanding.

title: Mod Contest Launched now!
contents: TOI Mod Contest S1 Steam Workshop for Tale of Immortal is now available! To reward the efforts of the mod creators and enrich the game content, we decided to hold a mod creation contest with multiple sections offering high rewards, welcome all the creators to join and show your excellent talentsÔºÅ 1. Registration channelÔºö Until July 3 24:00 CST, upload your original mod to TOI Workshop and mark it with the contest category. Package your mod into zip format and send it to with a title: Contest Category + Mod Name + The nickname of the Steam account you use to upload your mod. Please keep your email open so that we can contact you in time. 2. Entry qualificationÔºö The mod should be in the official mod editor framework, which can be automatically downloaded and updated after being subscribed. Only mods that meet TOI community regulations can be registered and win awards. The mod can run normally in the game. The mod has a picture and text introduction to briefly show its functions and characteristics. The identity of the uploader will be verified by the moderator, and anyone found to have signed up for the contest using another creator's mod will be disqualified. 3. Creator AwardÔºö The criteria for Creator Award The number of subscriptions will be the main criteria to score. We will evaluate whether the mods belong to the registered categories. The identity of the uploader will be verified by the moderator, and anyone found to have signed up for the contest using another creator's mod will be disqualified. If any mod in the award ranking is involved in the above situation, the results and reasons for handling will be publicized. We will sum up the subscription count for all participating mods at 12:00 on July 17th CST, make the above decision, and announce the final list on July 29th CST. Each mod can only be uploaded to one category and awarded once, and will be ranked and awarded in the category registered in the mail. 3.2 Categories and Prizes for Creator Award Large Integrated Mods that are registered for this category should include a series of quests that run through 4 or more echelons. title: „ÄêEye of Providence „ÄëVersion Update
contents: Hello Cultivators, the Eye of Providence version is now officially released! At this stage, only 50% of the text content in the new version has been localized, and it will take approximately 2-3 weeks for the rest of the text to be fully translated. Of course, we understand that some cultivators who can't wait to experience the new version and intend to use Google Translator on their own, we still suggest that players wait for a few weeks until the English localization is fully completed to maximize your gaming experience~ Check out the video and look into „ÄêEye of Providence „Äë Updated at 21:00 on January 17, 2022 1. Unlocked the Artifact (Eye of Providence) with the following functions. „ÄÄAdded 1 grid of large map view. There is a probability to view more items when viewing NPC backpack. When fighting with the Mythical Beast, there is a probability to learn the skills they cast. When you take a fatal injury in battle, you can rewind the time to the state before you were seriously injured and get out of the battle. 2. The following Adventures have been added. „ÄÄWhere the Wind Blows (can be triggered after completing the main quest Suiren Kindles the First Flame). 3. Added dynamic expressions for NPC dialogue. 4. Optimized some of the Adventures of Elder Dragon Aura. 5. Optimized the confirmation method of Adventures, dialogues, and monthly refreshing (use WASD and space to select and confirm). 6. Optimized the purchase interface of Treasure Pavilion. 7. Optimized the display of the power bar when casting the power accumulation skill. 8. Fixed the problem that NPCs may come to ask for guidance during the Qi refining period. 9. Added the classification function of gift items. 10. Fixed the problem of incorrect coercion of the Taoist Title. 13. Fixed the problem of changing Martial stuck when challenging the Taoist Title. 14. Fixed the problem that the items (Winning Lot) could not be consumed normally. 15. Added the function of adjusting the authority of the Grand Elder or Elder to dispatch the population. 16. Fixed the problem that after retreating from the sect, there may still be NPCs from the original sect to ask about sect affairs. 17. Fixed the problem of Intelligent (Destiny Nature), sometimes reducing the mood cap does not match the description (previously it was reducing the percentage, while the description was reducing the fixed value). 18. Optimized the Artifact Spirit Jiang Lingge's talent description (Energy can improve ATK ) incomplete problem (the effect did not change, supplemented the missing description). 19. Fixed the problem that some attack ballistics may cause multiple damage. 20. Fixed the issue that NPCs would also show the charged bar when using the charged skill. 21. Fixed the problem that the character display at the top of the interface might be lost after receiving or submitting quests in sects and towns. 22. Fixed the problem that when the BOSS used the Water Motion Skills in some dungeons, it would cause the dungeon to get stuck and not settle normally. 23. Fixed the problem that when learning the manual, the experience progress showed 100% but the skill was not actually learned. 24. Added the volume adjustment setting of the Artifact Spirit voice. 25.
